content: of the last row until chart is complete note for rounds 4 5 21 19 21 23 25 heel stitches remain and 22 there is no need to carry the cc gusset setup cut cc leaving tail to weave in with mc and pick up and knit one stitch in each slipped stitch smaller needles k all stitches for 2 rounds work along edge of heel flap plus one in corner between texture chart for 20 rounds or until total length is heel flap and instep noting how many you picked approximately 6 5 inches from cast on or desired up place marker for start of instep work across length to top of heel flap ending with a complete instep in texture chart pattern as set note this repeat of texture chart means you will start with column 2 of the chart place marker for end of instep pick up and knit heel flap setup the same number of stitches in corner and along remove end of round marker k15 17 19 21 other side of heel flap then k9 10 11 12 stitches stitches to centre beginning of round at back of to new end of round at bottom of foot leg turn sl1 p28 32 36 40 these are your heel flap stitches turn gusset round 1 k to 2 stitches before start of instep heel flap k2tog work across instep in pattern as set ssk k row 1 rs *sl1 k1 repeat from * to last stitch to end of round k1 turn round 2 k to start of instep work across instep in row 2 ws sl1 p28 32 36 40 turn pattern as set k to end of round row 3 rs sl1 k2 *sl1 k1 repeat from * to last 2 stitches k2 turn repeat rounds 1 and 2 until 56 64 72 80 row 4 ws sl1 p28 32 36 40 turn stitches remain 27 31 35 39 on instep and 29 © 2021 nicole simmons page 2/3 33 37 41 on sole end of round k2tog k1 k all stitches for 1 round or until foot measures 1 5 1 5 2 2 inches less foot than desired length from back of heel work even as set until foot measures between 2 5 2 5 3 3 inches and 3 3 3 5 3 5 inches less toe than desired length from back of heel ending with round 1 k1 ssk k to 3 stitches before end of a complete repeat of texture chart k all stitches instep k2tog k2 ssk k to 3 stitches before end of for 1 round switch to larger needles attach cc round k2tog k1 and work foot colourwork chart repeating 14 round 2 work all stitches as set 16 18 20 times per round until chart is round 3 work all stitches as set complete cut cc leaving tail to weave in with mc and smaller needles k all stitches for 1 round work rounds 1
